title: Corrupt Aid

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
[[ - Lost Documents: Before the host reveals the rolelist used, the original one is shown to you first. You may replace the real rolelist with a fake one of your choosing. When 3 players have died, if you replaced the rolelist, it will be revealed that the rolelist was tampered by an Aide. The original rolelist will then be revealed.]] **The host may choose not to use this attribute.**
- Corruption Within: Select one role before day 3 begins. During from day 3 onwards, you will appear to be this role and appear to win with all Town members.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Leaked information: Select a player and predict what one of their next two targets will be. If your prediction is correct they will lose one use of one of their random abilities, and you will immediately gain a use of it. 2 uses.

fields.name: - Illicit Supply:
fields.value: Select a player and give them any ability that a role has. If they use the ability within the next two nights, they lose the ability to whisper for the rest of the game. 2 uses, 3 night cooldown.

fields.name: - Trade Secrets:
fields.value: When someone whispers to you, you may steal all of their abilities. They lose those abilities. 1 use.
